name: Zouk Machine
description: '''Zouk Machine''' is an all-female [[Zouk (musical movement)|zouk]] group from [[Guadeloupe]] which had several hits, particularly in [[France]], such as the summer number-one single on French [[SNEP|SNEP Singles Chart]] "[[Mald√≤n]] (la musique dans la peau)", in 1990 that sold over 1 million copies well more than any other Antillean band, even [[Kassav]].
